info.name: QOwnNotesAPI
info.summary: API for QOwnNotes, the open source (GPL) notepad for Linux, Mac OS X and Windows
info.description:
QOwnNotesAPI is the ownCloud/Nextcloud API for [QOwnNotes](http://www.qownnotes.org), the open source (GPL) notepad for Linux, Mac OS X and Windows, that works together with the notes application of ownCloud / Nextcloud.
The only purpose of this App is to provide API access to your ownCloud/Nextcloud server for your QOwnNotes desktop installation, you cannot use this App for anything else, if you don't have QOwnNotes installed on your desktop computer!
info.author: Patrizio Bekerle
